body.name: 82.2" Long-Handled Cleaning mop Suitable for Ceiling Windows and Floors, 360° rotatable, Comes with Extension Pole That can Extend from 22.8" to 82.2", 6 Replacement Fiber mop Pads.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 47 mins
features: 【Rotating Head Design】360°rotating mop head and triangular mop pad design, easy to reach and clean dead corners such as sofas, beds, wall corners, ceiling corners and window corners. You can use it to clean walls, ceilings, windows and corners, tile floors, wooden floors, car glass and more.

【Strong Extended Rod】This long handle wall cleaner is made of stainless steel hollow rod, which is lightweight, durable and not easy to break, easy to operate with one hand. Includes 5 metal extension rods that can be combined into 4 lengths. The adjustable range from 44"-98" allows you to clean any corner of the room without climbing ladders or bending over. It's also easier, more convenient, and safer than using a ladder.

【Removable and Washable】These replacement mop pads are machine washable, reusable and eco-friendly. You can reuse these pads and save money on buying unnecessary one-time replacement pads. Just toss the mat in the washing machine every time you're done cleaning.

【Multipurpose】This wall cleaning mop includes 3 microfiber cleaning pads for wet cleaning and 3 chenille mop pads for dry cleaning. The squeegee and microfiber scrubber work in combination with water and detergent to easily scrub away dirt and grime. It also features a rubber squeegee to scrape away excess water spots, adding a more professional clean when wiping windows for a truly streak-free shine.
【Easy to Install】No need to use screws, just connect the rod and mop head together for quick use. Reinforced stitching keeps walls from buckling against resistance when sweeping high places.

【Timely After-sales Service】If the product has any quality problems, please contact us, we will solve it within 24 hours. If you find any difficulties when using this product, please contact us, we will provide personalized service to all customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product to help me clean my shower walls and mirrors (I have high ceiling and it’s hard to clean hard to reach areas. This product is very helpful for reaching those areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work fairly well
reviews.reviewText: A little wonky at first but then I got the hang of it. Definitely the cheaper option, but it does the job so I’m content

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works wonders | Use with Caution on popcorn ceilings
reviews.reviewText: This ceiling duster arrived quickly and looks exactly as it does in the product images. The assembly takes under 5 minutes and it’s ready to dust. The ceilings in my home are vaulted and the AC ducts could use a good cleaning but we rent, so there isn’t too much that can be done as of right now. This lead to the ceiling getting dust right near every vent in our home (I change the main filter monthly) so this product was definitely necessary for us! This helped a ton with getting it off, but I do want to note that if you have a popcorn-textured ceiling it’s best to try and be somewhat gentle or some will fall. The only extendable pole was more than long enough to get the job done and the pads are so handy. I haven’t used the flash ones to wash my walls yet but I’m really looking forward to doing that as well to give my home an even fresher scent. Thus far I’ve loved how useful it’s been and I’m surprised by its overall durability! For $20 it’s a steal and I would certainly recommend it to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this extended length duster
reviews.reviewText: This particular extended duster is an amazing product that I won’t ever live without again! I love the effectiveness and efficiency of using this duster as well as the aid of its extended length. Awesome product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received this item and it seem to me it may have been repackaged but it was a reasonable price. I used it for my intended purpose and it worked well. I later was looking on Amazon, and saw that about half of the pads were not in the box. It worked well enough to keep but don't like that they didn't send what I thought I was buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have kids, you need this
reviews.reviewText: Okay so you and I both know the kids are messy. Somehow food and other things can get stuck to the most random places in your house. Also my children have these little sticky balls did they like to throw on the ceiling and wait for them to drop. Sometimes that leaves this adhesive spot on the ceiling, which drives me nuts.This is really easy to assemble and I can reach the ceiling without having to get out a step ladder. I like that it comes with multiple cleaning pads, and a squeegee. This covers all of my cleaning needs for walls and windows. Overall this has been extremely useful for me, and makes my job much easier. The best thing is that it's budget friendly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pole sections are to loose and fall apart. Unable to use pressure when doing ceiling as the poles flex to much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can clean my walls now lol
reviews.reviewText: It works great for tall walls because it comes with an extension pole. The pole makes it easy to reach the top, and the mop itself is easy to use. I can quickly and easily wipe down my walls without having to climb up a ladder or use a step stool.
